verses.text: At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Hew|strong="H6458"\w* thee \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* like unto the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, and come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto me into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee an \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

And I will \w write|strong="H3789"\w* on the \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that were in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* which thou \w brakest|strong="H7665"\w*, and thou shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* them in the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*.

And I \w made|strong="H6213"\w* an \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w hewed|strong="H6458"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* like unto the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, having the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* on the \w tables|strong="H3871"\w*, according to the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w writing|strong="H4385"\w*, the \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto you in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them unto me.  +  r 10.4  t commandments: Heb. words *

And I \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* myself and came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* in the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* which I had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*; and there they be, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* took their \w journey|strong="H5265"\w* from Beeroth of the children of \w Jaakan|strong="H0885"\w* to \w Mosera|strong="H4149"\w*: there \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and there he was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*; and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* ministered in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w* in his stead.

From thence they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* unto \w Gudgodah|strong="H1412"\w*; and from \w Gudgodah|strong="H1412"\w* to \w Jotbath|strong="H3193"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w rivers|strong="H5158"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

¶ At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto him, and to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* in his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Wherefore \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* hath no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* nor \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* with his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*; the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, according as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* him.

And I \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, according to the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto me at that \w time|strong="H6471"\w* also, \add and\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* thee.  +  r 10.10  t first…: or, former days *

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w take|strong="H3212"\w* \add thy\add* \w journey|strong="H4550"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they may go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 10.11 \ft take…: Heb. go in journey\f*

¶ And now, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, what doth the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w require|strong="H7592"\w* of thee, but to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* him, and to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with all thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and with all thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*,

To \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for thy \w good|strong="H2896"\w*?

Behold, the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* of \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add also\add*, with all that therein \add is\add*.

Only the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had a \w delight|strong="H2836"\w* in thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* them, and he \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, \add even\add* you above all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w Circumcise|strong="H4135"\w* therefore the \w foreskin|strong="H6190"\w* of your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and be no more \w stiffnecked|strong="H6203"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* of \w lords|strong="H0113"\w*, a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, and a \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w*, which \w regardeth|strong="H5375"\w* not \w persons|strong="H6440"\w*, nor \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* \w reward|strong="H7810"\w*:

He doth \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* and \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, and \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, in \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* him \w food|strong="H3899"\w* and \w raiment|strong="H8071"\w*.
\w Love|strong="H0157"\w* ye therefore the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*: for ye were \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

Thou shalt \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; him shalt thou \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*, and to him shalt thou \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w*, and \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

He \add is\add* thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*, and he \add is\add* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for thee these \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and terrible \w things|strong="H3372"\w*, which thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*.

Thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* with threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w*; and now the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* thee as the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*.
